name: Beast Tamers (Tame The Beast)
description:
BEAST TAMER (TAME THE BEAST) 

Evil Organization Dark Superiors are returning to the world of Beast Tamers (Tame The Beast). Its You Who can save the world. Because if Dark Superiors succeed. They will Destroy the world with their cruelty....Catch and Train Your Beasts teach them new attack moves power up them with help of Crafting. Teach them Super Attack Moves call Ultimate Earn Medals by defeating Arenas and fight for the title for

" No.1 Beast Tamer In The World ".  

This game is made by just one person so your all help/suggestions  are welcome :). Added Ultimate Moves  Crafting System Little Walk through Game is Free To Play and Currently In Beta Stage so  feel free to report me any  bug you face :) at my Email :-

developer.ekonkargames@gmail.com
